sentence: In a March 3 news release, Attorney General Josh Shapiro highlighted potential unfair and deceptive practices of car dealerships that violate the commonwealth’s Consumer Protection Law.
author: Corey Morris
title: AG Shapiro puts commonwealth car dealers on notice

sentence: (WJET/WFXP/YourErie.com) — Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro met with police chiefs from across Pennsylvania where he heard a unified message.
title: PA Attorney General told of police shortages

title: Pa. attorney general meets with police chiefs, discusses shortages
